ability.Vessel of Ruin: Target Pokemon have their Special Attack multiplied by 0.75.
ability.Mound: Halve the damage from Water-type moves.

Ruination.effect: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP.

Rock Slide.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Ancient Curse.effect: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.

Sin-Absorb.effect: Takes effect after the opponent's move. If the opponent attacks the user, the user restores 2/3 its maximum HP, otherwise restores 1/3 maximum HP.
